H0.text: Reproduction is the process by which organisms give rise to offspring.

H1.text: Differentiation is the process by which organisms give rise to offspring.

H2.text: Evolution is the process by which organisms give rise to offspring.

H3.text: Photosynthesis is the process by which organisms give rise to offspring.

A4.text: Asexual reproduction is a process by which organisms create genetically similar or identical copies of themselves without the contribution of genetic material from another organism.

A5.text: Sexual reproduction is a biological process that creates a new organism by combining the genetic material of two organisms in a process that starts with meiosis, a specialized type of cell division.
